overview: Two young and gorgeous heiresses are invited to the French capital shortly after their father's death. They will quickly become objects of desire for a band of lecherous rascals. As soon as they arrive, Roxy and Shana are greeted by Liza. Liza hurries to introduce them to two television producers, and, incapable of resisting these young men's "French charm", the two sisters will soon give themselves to them, and succumb to their every wish and most perverse desires. Roxy will soon peel off her exquisite evening gown and suck Jacques' cock before Jacques has even suggested leaving to continue the evening with two of his friends. As for Shana, she follows Pierre into an abandoned factory where she is impatiently awaited by two lusty men. It seems that France's capital has a lot of surprises in store for our two charming girls from Quebec.
title: My Sister and Me
